site_url.description: The URL of the site from which the data originates.

search_type.description: The type of search (e.g., web, image, video) that triggered the search result.

date.description: The date when the search query occurred.

country.description: The country from which the search query originated.

device.description: The type of device used by the user (e.g., desktop, mobile).

page.description: The page URL that appeared in the search results.

query.description: The search query entered by the user.

clicks.description: The number of times users clicked on the search result for a specific query.

impressions.description: The number of times a search result appeared in response to a query.

ctr.description: Click-through rate, calculated as clicks divided by impressions.

position.description: The average position of the search result on the search engine results page.
